plays.text: Goal scored by Aleksey Morozov assisted by Mario Lemieux and Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Andy Sutton 2 minutes for Slashing Dan LaCouture
Penalty to Steve McKenna 2 minutes for Interference Richard Smehlik
Penalty to Daniel Tjarnqvist 2 minutes for Holding Shean Donovan
Goal scored by Alexei Kovalev assisted by Mario Lemieux and Randy Robitaille
Penalty to Jan Hrdina 2 minutes for High Sticking Dan Snyder
Penalty to Andy Sutton 2 minutes for Roughing Randy Robitaille
Penalty to Dan Snyder 2 minutes for Hooking Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Andy Sutton 2 minutes for Roughing Jamie Pushor
Penalty to Richard Smehlik 2 minutes for High Sticking Jan Hrdina
Goal scored by Randy Robitaille assisted by Mario Lemieux and Dick Tarnstrom
Penalty to Shean Donovan 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Kirill Safronov
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Holding Tony Hrkac
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jan Hrdina 2 minutes for Tripping Dany Heatley
Goal scored by Ilya Kovalchuk assisted by Vyacheslav Kozlov and Dany Heatley
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Ilya Kovalchuk
Penalty to Kirill Safronov 2 minutes for Crosschecking Dan LaCouture
Goal scored by Dany Heatley assisted by Patrik Stefan
Penalty to Shean Donovan 2 minutes for Interference Daniel Tjarnqvist
